description:
Hentai Uni 2 is a sequel to our last year's hit. Luckily, you can still play it with one hand. In HU2 you'll get to see both old and completely new characters. 
15 unique jigsaw puzzles 75+ levels Each scene has voice-over, which helps reveal the character through a short story.
name: Hentai Uni 2
intro: Sequel to a relaxing puzzle game featuring charming girls.
